summary: Completed comprehensive testing of enhanced CastingKart Financial Master Planner with all new dynamic features. All enhanced sections including dynamic team members, infrastructure costs, hardware equipment, travel costs, other expenses/income, and funding rounds are fully functional with real-time calculations.
passed_tests: Backend API health endpoints (/api/, /api/health) - 100% success
Enhanced default inputs endpoint with all new dynamic sections
Dynamic Team Members - add/remove founders, interns, employees with salary and start date
Physical Infrastructure section - office rent, electricity, internet, maintenance fields
Digital Infrastructure section - hosting, storage, SaaS tools, AI compute
Hardware & Equipment - dynamic items with unit cost, quantity, purchase date (Add Item works)
Travel Costs - dynamic items with recurring/one-time option (Add Item works)
Other Expenses - dynamic items with name, amount, type, start date (Add Item works)
Other Income Sources - dynamic items for miscellaneous income (Add Item works)
Funding Rounds - multiple funding rounds with investor name (Add Item works)
Enhanced calculation endpoint with all new cost categories
Dynamic section modifications - calculations update correctly with new items
Scenario variations (Conservative < Base < Aggressive) working correctly
Real-time calculations update when inputs change
Costs screen shows all 8 enhanced cost categories (Team, Digital Infra, Physical Infra, Hardware, Marketing, Travel, Admin, Other)
Cost breakdown charts display all categories with proper color coding
Monthly and Annual cost tables show detailed breakdown
KPI cards showing Year 1 Total Costs, Avg Monthly Burn, Fixed/Variable cost percentages
Cost composition pie chart showing percentage breakdown
Navigation between all screens (Master Inputs, Revenue, Costs, P&L, Cash Flow, Unit Economics, Key Metrics, Scenarios)
Export to Excel button present and functional
Professional investor-grade UI design maintained
All input field interactions working (dropdowns, sliders, number inputs, Add buttons)
Chart visualizations working (Area charts, Bar charts, Pie charts)
Data tables displaying correctly with proper formatting
